resources.string:
I have a bachelor’s degree in Medicine and Surgery (MBBS) from University of Benin, Benin City, Nigeria.


And I recently bagged a master’s degree in Medical Informatics at Deggendorf University of Applied Science (European Campus), Pfarrkirchen, Bavaria, Germany.


I currently work as a Data Scientist at Vivy GmbH, a startup in Berlin.


My Skill sets span across programming (Python, Kotlin, SQL, Javascript), mobile app development (Android), statistics, data mining, data visualization, and Machine Learning.


My working experience of over 5 years as a medical doctor has proven beneficial in developing Machine Learning applications for the healthcare sector.
